Static Public Member Functions

static page ($p)
 an action called page, shows the action 'page'

Detailed Description

a typical controller derives from Controller.

TestController is a controller named 'test', thus the layout for the controller should be views/layout/test.php, and the views for the actions should be put inside views/test.
